DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy safety clobetasol propionate 0.05 % ( Clobex® ) spray compare clobetasol propionate 0.05 % ( Olux® ) foam .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Between Clobetasol Propionate 0.05 % ( Clobex® ) Spray Clobetasol Propionate 0.05 % ( Olux® ) Foam
DOC.criteria: Subjects must clinical diagnosis moderate severe plaque psoriasis , define 3 % 20 % body surface area involve Subjects surface area involvement large would require 50 gram per week Clobex® spray 50 gram per week Olux® foam Subjects whose psoriasis involve scalp , face groin Subjects nonplaque psoriasis relate disease classify plaque psoriasis
